lines.text: [Goofy's peaceful sleep in a shack is disturbed by a train that passes by perilously close to it]

[leaving the shack]
I'm gettin' out of this here place!
[Goofy is driving along and sees a hitchhiker at the side of the road. He stops the car beside him]
Uh, give you a lift, mister?

[looking at car]
Hmm, no radio, no heater...
tires' thin, needs paint, older model... Mmm-mmm, forget it.
